description: This file sets up a WhatsApp chatbot agent with user memory, integrating various components such as memory management, Google search tools, and the WhatsApp API. It initializes memory storage, configures an agent with instructions, and starts a web server for the chatbot.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, tools, memory, and instructions for interaction.

classes.name: WhatsappAPI
classes.description: Provides an interface to interact with WhatsApp, including starting a web server for the chatbot.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles SQLite database operations for storing memory data.

classes.name: MemoryManager
classes.description: Manages the memory capture and retrieval process.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Represents the memory component associated with the agent.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A Google model used for generating or processing information within the agent.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage operations in SQLite databases.

classes.name: GoogleSearchTools
classes.description: Provides tools to perform Google searches within the agent's context.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Resets the memory for the current session.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the web application instance from the WhatsApp API.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the web server to run the WhatsApp chatbot.
